details.point: Full stack LLM-enhanced research project for accessible audio translation with a focus on preserving rhythm, emotion, and artistic intent.
Content translated by Voquel has reached almost 1 Million viewers over 70 different videos.
Received Honorable Mention at the 2025 Synopsys Science Fair (top 10% out of ~1000 competitors); recognized by the City of San Jose for language preservation efforts.

title: PercGAN
broadDescription: A lightweight machine learning approach for high-fidelity stereo audio sample generation

details.point: Developed a lightweight generative network for high-fidelity stereo percussion generation presenting unique audio representation and enhanced StyleGAN architecture.
Achieved an 85% quality improvement and 25Ã— training-time reduction compared to WaveGAN, MelGAN, etc.
Created aerial fungal infection treatment system with 3D-printed prototype components for targeted agricultural application.
Won first place out of 260 teams at the 2024 FlexFactor Entrepreneurship Championships, presenting to civil and aerospace engineering panels.
Built data collection and visualization platform enabling real-time match analytics for 200+ users during FRC competitions.
Implemented advanced analytics tools for alliance selection strategy, and trained 10+ developers in application and interface design.

title: Domotron
broadDescription: FRC604's Robot for the 2024 FRC Game "Crescendo"

details.point: Implemented computer vision and physics-based shot calculation systems for precise game piece targeting.
Developed driver control automation and competitive autonomous routines for optimal match performance.
Designed and implemented chain climbing mechanism critical to end-game scoring strategy.
Directly contributed to robot winning Milstein World Championship division, 3 California regional events, and 5 additional awards.
